content: **introducing the basic messy bun hat crochet pattern - the perfect solution for keeping your head warm while still allowing you to rock your messy bun or ponytail this simple and easy pattern is perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike making it a quick and fun project to complete with its open top design this hat is ideal for those days when you just don t feel like tucking your hair into a regular beanie designed to fit the average adult head circumference yet can be easily adapted by simply adjusting your hook size ** if you have any questions about this
